heading: HR00556
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON UNABATED SMUGGLING OF GOODS INTO THE COUNTRY BY UNSCRUPULOUS OPERATORS OF CUSTOMS BONDED WAREHOUSES TO THE DETRIMENT OF LOCAL MANUFACTURERS AND PRODUCERS AND THE PHILIPPINE ECONOMY, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF RECOMMENDING MEASURES TO STOP SMUGGLING USING THE WAREHOUSING SYSTEM BY REVISITING THE PROVISIONS OF THE CUSTOMS MODERNIZATION TARIFF ACT ON BONDED WAREHOUSES AND LIMITING THE TYPE, NATURE AND NUMBER OF BONDED WAREHOUSES
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2019-12-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00556
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON UNABATED SMUGGLING OF GOODS INTO THE COUNTRY BY UNSCRUPULOUS OPERATORS OF CUSTOMS BONDED WAREHOUSES TO THE DETRIMENT OF LOCAL MANUFACTURERS AND PRODUCERS AND THE PHILIPPINE ECONOMY, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF RECOMMENDING MEASURES TO STOP SMUGGLING USING THE WAREHOUSING SYSTEM BY REVISITING THE PROVISIONS OF THE CUSTOMS MODERNIZATION TARIFF ACT ON BONDED WAREHOUSES AND LIMITING THE TYPE, NATURE AND NUMBER OF BONDED WAREHOUSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PICHAY, PROSPERO JR. A.
DATE FILED : 2019-11-28
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Alonte (000 2020-02-12)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2019-12-11
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-12-04;
